document_title: Adrenal insufficiency: Causes, signs and treatments
subsection_content:
Adrenal insufficiency greatly affects health. From the causes of adrenal insufficiency, people as well as patients need to pay attention to the following issues to prevent the disease.
The arbitrary use of corticosteroids, especially in people with bone and joint diseases, is the main cause of secondary adrenal insufficiency. Therefore, no matter what disease you have, without a doctor's prescription, people should not arbitrarily use drugs or drugs containing corticosteroids.; In case of conditions that require long-term use of corticosteroids, the patient needs to have regular medical examinations according to the doctor's appointment or whenever the body shows unusual symptoms to adjust the medication and treatment regimen. suitable treatment.; In case the patient has adrenal insufficiency, acute adrenal insufficiency is very dangerous, threatening death if not treated promptly. Therefore, patients must use corticosteroids for life and must always carry reserve medication with them. When experiencing stress, you need to immediately notify your doctor to adjust the medication dose because at this time the body does not respond to oral corticosteroids.
Adrenal insufficiency is common in Vietnam due to prolonged use of corticosteroids, often in patients with asthma and rheumatoid arthritis. Therefore, patients should not arbitrarily use corticosteroids or when treating asthma or rheumatoid arthritis, they should see an Endocrinologist - Diabetic to control the condition and not let depression occur. adrenals.
